segments.text: I see an indoor kitchen scene, depicted as a line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Three people are in view: an adult woman and two children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The perspective is slightly angled, revealing a sink and counter along the right wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinets line the left and center walls of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It appears to be daytime, as an open window above the sink looks out onto a yard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The single-basin sink is dramatically overflowing right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running continuously from the faucet, filling the basin and pouring over the front edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a continuous sheet onto the cabinet doors and the floor, creating a widening puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice this growing disaster?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely surprised by her complete obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a slight fear that someone might slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands directly in front of the sink, facing left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is drying or polishing a plate with a dish towel, her attention seems entirely fixed on the plate she holds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find her unawareness of the overflow almost disgusting to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
